div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1085 Velikaia Mikhailovka, Odessa ob- last, Ukraine, 1949 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: 31+ AE Olbia: AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 26-29 [12], 30 [17]; pl. 10, 24) Disposition: Odessa Karyszkowski, Pratsi Odes'kogo Derzhavnogo Universiteta, 149, Seriia istorichnikh nauk, issue 7 (Odessa, 1959), pp. 138-42 (in Ukrainian) (14 coins only); further informa- tion from Karyszkowski
